headline.main: ELIZABETH CADY STANTON DIES AT HER HOME; Noted Advocate of Woman's Suffrage Nearly 87 Years Old. Her Championship of Her Political Belief Almost Lifelong -- Her Companionship with Miss Susan B. Anthony.

snippet: Mrs. Elizabeth Cady Stanton died at 3 o'clock yesterday afternoon at her home in the Stuart Apartment House, 230 West Ninety-fourth Street. Had she lived until the 12th of next month she would have completed her eighty-seventh year. Mrs. Stanton h...
